data.title: Abidemi Sanusi
data.text:
Nigerian author

Abidemi Sanusi is a Nigerian author.

Biography

[edit]

Abidemi Sanusi was born in Lagos, Nigeria. She had her Education in England, and attended Leeds University.[citation needed]

Sanusi worked as a human rights worker, and now manages a website for writers.[citation needed]

Kemi's Journal (2005) was her first work of fiction, followed by Zack's Story of Life, Love and Everything. God Has Daughters Too is a devotional book written about 10 women of the Old Testament.[1] Her novel, Eyo, published by WordAlive Publishers was shortlisted for the 2010 Commonwealth Writers' Prize.[2]

Works published

[edit]

Eyo (2009)

Kemi's Journal (2005)[citation needed]

God Has Daughters Too (2006)[citation needed]

Zack's Story of Life, Love and Everything (2006)[citation needed]

Looking for Bono (2020)[citation needed]
